snippet: A man with Duchenne muscular dystrophy has difficulty maneuvering his wheelchair in his new home. His old one was badly damaged by Hurricane Sandy and is uninhabitable.
abstract: UJA-Federation of New York, one of the organizations supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund,  provides Jason Celik and his family funds to buy three beds for their new residence.
lead_paragraph: A man with Duchenne muscular dystrophy has difficulty maneuvering his wheelchair in his new home. His old one was badly damaged by Hurricane Sandy and is uninhabitable.

headline.print_headline: Young Man Dispossessed by Hurricane Is a Virtual Prisoner in His New Home
headline.seo: Hurricane Sandy Victim, Ill, Is Restricted in New Home
headline.main: Young Man Dispossessed by Hurricane Is a Virtual Prisoner in His New Home

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund
